name: Seashail
description: Expose Seashail wallet boundary tools as native OpenClaw tools (spawns `seashail mcp` locally).

seashailPath.description: Path to the Seashail executable (default: seashail on PATH).

network.description: Session-only network override for this OpenClaw plugin.

standalone.description: If true, run Seashail MCP in standalone mode (no daemon).

toolPrefix.description: If true, prefix all tool names (avoids collisions).

prefix.description: Tool name prefix used when toolPrefix=true.

passphraseEnvVar.description: If set and present in the OpenClaw gateway environment, the plugin will auto-answer Seashail passphrase prompts with this env var (recommended for non-interactive clients).

env.description: Extra environment variables to pass to the Seashail subprocess.
